mapper.insert: insert into cart(cart_id,product_id,id,product_count,state) values((select NVL( MAX(cart_id) , 0) + 1 from cart),(select product_id from product where name = #{name} ),#{id},1,#{image})
mapper.select: select cart_id , p.product_id , c.id , name , image , product_count , price , (price*product_count) totalPrice , c.state from member m, cart c, product p where 1=1 and m.id=c.id and c.product_id=p.product_id and m.id=#{id} order by cart_id
mapper.update: update cart set product_count=#{product_count} where cart_id = #{cart_id}
